sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the surgical treatment of the acromegalic cardiomyopathy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨肢端肥大症性心肌病的神经外科手术治疗和疗效.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Positive surgical treatments can take satisfactory effects on acromegalic cardiomyopathy.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论肢端肥大症性心肌病经积极的手术治疗能够获得满意的疗效.

sentence.Network_en: This article analysed the clinical manifestations and endocrinological changes after pituitary apoplexy in 8 acromegalic patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文分析8例暴发型肢端肥大症垂体卒中的临床表现及内分泌功能改变.
